Provided by: performous-tools_1.1+git20181118-5ubuntu3_amd64 

NAME
       ss_chc_decode - Tool for decoding Singstar CHC (melody cache) files


SYNOPSIS
       ss_chc_decode chc_file key1 key2 key3 key4 track_id

       chc_file
              Singstar melody cache file

       key1 to key4
              keys to decode the cache file

       track_id
              Singstar track id to extract


DESCRIPTION
       Tool for decrypting Singstar CHC files.


SEE ALSO
       performous(6)

                                                                                                ss_chc_decode(1)
